vecUnachieved.strDescription: Punch the throttle and take flight for the first time!

vecUnachieved.strName: We land this aircraft is that understood?
vecUnachieved.strDescription: Landed the plane and docked it at the village for the first time!

vecUnachieved.strName: Someone who knows that plane inside and out!
vecUnachieved.strDescription: Fly a distance of 20 kilometers! Don't worry, the plane runs on renewable energy

vecUnachieved.strName: It's an entirely different kind of flying. Altogether!
vecUnachieved.strDescription: It's an entirely different kind of flying! Completed your first race!

vecUnachieved.strName: You can be my wingman any time.
vecUnachieved.strDescription: Helped out every villager and completed every quest! Remember to bill them next time.
Found all the random spyglasses people lost over the years.

vecUnachieved.strName: The list is long, but distinguished.
vecUnachieved.strDescription: Achieve a bronze rank or higher in both races. That's something already.

vecUnachieved.strName: This is what I call a target-rich environment!
vecUnachieved.strDescription: Took Samuel's amusement away by shooting all the targets out of the sky!
Achieve a silver rank or higher in both races. That's pretty good!
Achieve a gold rank in both races. Your flight skills are excellent!
Completed all other achievements in the game! You can retire now.

data.strFullDescription:
Welcome to SKYE! A flight game where you explore a beautiful painterly island group, inspired by the Scottish Hebrides.

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1214360/extras/GameplayGif.gif?t=1598964327[/img]

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1214360/extras/SteamStoreBanner_RelaxingFlight.png?t=1598964327[/img]
In SKYE you explore the land in your trusty seaplane. You can land your plane anywhere on the water and visit the local port to pick up quests. The surrounding environment allows for you to maneuver through rock arches, to pass rock formations and to soar island peaks.

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1214360/extras/SteamStoreBanner_Explore_Quest.png?t=1598964327[/img]
The quests from the locals challenge you to guide ships, follow other airplanes, pick-up goods and to set the fastest times in races! You can also explore and experience the world at your own pace and allow yourself to be distracted by collectibles, can you find them all?

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1214360/extras/SteamStoreBanner_PainterlyEnv.png?t=1598964327[/img]
The world of SKYE has a painterly effect which gives it a unique look. The beautiful world is crafted with attention to each of its features: whether it's the waters surrounding the islands, the steep rock cliffs or the green plains filled with flowers.

SKYE is created by a team of 3rd year game development students from Breda University of Applied Sciences (formerly known as NHTV) with the soundtrack provided by Alex Tosh. After four months of active development, preceded by half a year of concepting, we are excited to finally be sharing our game on Steam!

Join our [url=https://discord.gg/YbWqJ4W]Discord Community[/url] today!
data.strSnippet: SKYE is a relaxing explorative game where you venture into a world inspired by the Western Isles. Fly around the captivating islands, help the locals with their troubles, and set the fastest time in races while absorbing everything around you through the painterly environment.
